modules.name: poll
modules.description: This module best used if you want to get a quick feedback from the group about a specific topic with already defined opinions/answers.

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: The question asked, only shown in presenter view
parameters.value: What is the meaning of life?

parameters.name: answers
parameters.description: A set of options you want to provide for the presenters to vote on

parameters.name: timer
parameters.description: Publish a poll with a time constraint (in seconds). After elapsed time participant won't be able to vote anymore nor will the presenter accept voting results.

modules.name: pair
modules.description: This module you should use if participants need to pair with the presenter instance. The view generates the amount of currently active participants and generates a QR code which encodes a valid participant link.
